name: R4B-Encounter-R5-Encounter
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B Encounter into FHIR R5

element.display: An interaction during which services are provided to the patient

target.display: An interaction during which services are provided to the patient
target.comment: R4B `Encounter` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter`

element.display: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this Encounter

target.display: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this Encounter
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.account` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.account`

element.display: The appointment that scheduled this encounter

target.display: The appointment that scheduled this encounter
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.appointment` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.appointment`

element.display: The ServiceRequest that initiated this encounter

target.display: The request that initiated this encounter
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.basedOn` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R5 `Encounter.basedOn` - basedOn has change due to type change: R4B `basedOn` `Reference` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R5 `basedOn`

element.display: Classification of patient encounter

target.display: Classification of patient encounter context - e.g. Inpatient, outpatient
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.class` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Encounter.class` - class changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); class changed the binding strength from Extensible to Preferred; class has change due to type change: R4B class Coding has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 class

element.display: List of past encounter classes
inpatient | outpatient | ambulatory | emergency +
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
The time that the episode was in the specified class
Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.contained`

element.display: The list of diagnosis relevant to this encounter

target.display: The list of diagnosis relevant to this encounter
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.diagnosis` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.diagnosis`

element.display: The diagnosis or procedure relevant to the encounter

target.display: The diagnosis relevant to the encounter
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.diagnosis.condition` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Encounter.diagnosis.condition` - condition changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); condition added a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-code; condition has change due to type change: R4B condition Reference has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 condition

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.diagnosis.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Encounter.diagnosis.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.diagnosis.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.diagnosis.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.diagnosis.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Encounter.diagnosis.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Ranking of the diagnosis (for each role type)
Role that this diagnosis has within the encounter (e.g. admission, billing, discharge …)

target.display: Role that this diagnosis has within the encounter (e.g. admission, billing, discharge …)
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.diagnosis.use` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Encounter.diagnosis.use` - use changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)

element.display: Episode(s) of care that this encounter should be recorded against

target.display: Episode(s) of care that this encounter should be recorded against
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.episodeOfCare` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.episodeOfCare`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Encounter.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Details about the admission to a healthcare service
From where patient was admitted (physician referral, transfer)
Location/organization to which the patient is discharged
Diet preferences reported by the patient
Category or kind of location after discharge
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
The location/organization from which the patient came before admission
Pre-admission identifier
The type of hospital re-admission that has occurred (if any). If the value is absent, then this is not identified as a readmission
Wheelchair, translator, stretcher, etc.
Special courtesies (VIP, board member)
Logical id of this artifact

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.id`

element.display: Identifier(s) by which this encounter is known

target.display: Identifier(s) by which this encounter is known
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.implicitRules`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Encounter.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0

element.display: Quantity of time the encounter lasted (less time absent)

target.display: Actual quantity of time the encounter lasted (less time absent)
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.length` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.length`

element.display: List of locations where the patient has been

target.display: List of locations where the patient has been
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.location` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.location`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.location.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Encounter.location.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.location.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.location.id`

element.display: Location the encounter takes place

target.display: Location the encounter takes place
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.location.location` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.location.location`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.location.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Encounter.location.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Time period during which the patient was present at the location

target.display: Time period during which the patient was present at the location
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.location.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.location.period`

element.display: The physical type of the location (usually the level in the location hierachy - bed room ward etc.)
planned | active | reserved | completed

target.display: planned | active | reserved | completed
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.location.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.location.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/encounter-location-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/encounter-location-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Metadata about the resource

target.display: Metadata about the resource
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.meta`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Encounter.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: List of participants involved in the encounter

target.display: List of participants involved in the encounter
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.participant` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.participant`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.participant.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Encounter.participant.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.participant.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.participant.id`

element.display: Persons involved in the encounter other than the patient
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.participant.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Encounter.participant.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Period of time during the encounter that the participant participated

target.display: Period of time during the encounter that the participant participated
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.participant.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.participant.period`

element.display: Role of participant in encounter

target.display: Role of participant in encounter
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.participant.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.participant.type`

element.display: Another Encounter this encounter is part of

target.display: Another Encounter this encounter is part of
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.partOf` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.partOf`

element.display: The start and end time of the encounter
Indicates the urgency of the encounter

target.display: Indicates the urgency of the encounter
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.priority` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.priority`

element.display: Coded reason the encounter takes place
Reason the encounter takes place (reference)
The organization (facility) responsible for this encounter

target.display: The organization (facility) responsible for this encounter
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.serviceProvider` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.serviceProvider`

element.display: Specific type of service

target.display: Specific type of service
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.serviceType` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Encounter.serviceType` - serviceType changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *); serviceType has change due to type change: R4B serviceType CodeableConcept has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 serviceType

element.display: planned | arrived | triaged | in-progress | onleave | finished | cancelled +

target.display: planned | in-progress | on-hold | discharged | completed | cancelled | discontinued | entered-in-error | unknown
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.status` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `Encounter.status` - status has INCOMPATIBLE required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/encounter-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/encounter-status|5.0.0

element.display: List of past encounter statuses
Additional content defined by implementations
Unique id for inter-element referencing
Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
The time that the episode was in the specified status
planned | arrived | triaged | in-progress | onleave | finished | cancelled +
The patient or group present at the encounter

target.display: The patient or group related to this encounter
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.subject` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.subject`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.text`

element.display: Specific type of encounter

target.display: Specific type of encounter (e.g. e-mail consultation, surgical day-care, ...)
target.comment: R4B `Encounter.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `Encounter.type`
